title: World War Weird
overview: From platoons that vanished to strange 'alien' war machines, World War II is the source of hundreds of unsolved mysteries. In the chaos of battle, these inexplicable occurrences went unexplored, but now, thanks to incredible archive, expert interviews and eyewitness accounts, this series explores some of World War II's most baffling mysteries; each a compelling story with twists and turns and revelations.
